## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Ore Mining and Processing Facility at Position (-15.0, -50.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (-15.0, -50.0)
- Iron Chests at positions (-16.5, -48.5), (-15.5, -48.5), (-14.5, -48.5), (-13.5, -49.5)
- Stone Furnace at position (-13.0, -48.0)
- Wooden Chest at position (-12.5, -49.5)
- Burner Inserters at positions (-11.5, -49.5), (-10.5, -49.5), (-8.5, -49.5)
- Additional Furnaces at positions (-11.0, -48.0), (-9.0, -48.0)

### Coal Mining and Processing Facility at Position (41.0, -82.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (41.0, -82.0)
- Stone Furnace at position (43.0, -82.0)
- Iron Chests at positions (41.5, -80.5), (42.5, -80.5), (44.5, -80.5), (45.5, -80.5), (47.5, -80.5), (49.5, -80.5)
- Wooden Chest at position (41.5, -79.5)
- Burner Inserters at positions (43.5, -80.5), (41.5, -78.5)

### Iron Plate Storage Facility at Position (-14.5, -47.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Iron Chest at position (-14.5, -47.5)

### Iron Gear Wheel Storage Facility at Position (-14.5, -47.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Iron Chest at position (-14.5, -47.5)

### Iron Plate Distribution System
Consists of the following entities:
- Wooden Chests at positions (-11.5, -45.5), (-10.5, -45.5)
- Burner Inserters at positions (-12.5, -44.5), (-10.5, -44.5), (-8.5, -44.5)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when placing entities without inventory
- Ensure you have the required entity in your inventory before attempting to place it.

### Errors due to insufficient inventory space
- Regularly check your inventory space and clear it by depositing items into chests or using them in crafting.

### Errors when crafting without required ingredients
- Verify that you have all necessary ingredients before attempting to craft an item.

### Errors when inserters are waiting for items
- Check the upstream supply chain to ensure that items are being fed into the inserters.

### Errors when extracting from non-existent or full chests
- Confirm the existence and availability of resources in the target chest before attempting extraction.

### Errors due to incorrect API usage
- Ensure the correct attributes and methods are used when interacting with entities, such as checking for the presence of an 'inventory' attribute.
